sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). 2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. 3. Add diced onion and minced garlic, cook until softened. 4. In a mixing bowl, combine cooked and shredded chicken, chopped broccoli, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, shredded cheddar cheese, cooked onion, and garlic. 5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish. 6. Bake for 25-30, until bubbly and golden brown on top. 7. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="American">c7495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd3</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Breast (2, cooked and shredded),</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Chicken and Broccoli Casserole</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cook and shred chicken. 2. Chop broccoli. 3. Cook rice. 4. Dice onion. 5. Mince garlic.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>38ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
